mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IBOARD( IBOARD_NO, IBOARD_TITLE, IBOARD_CONTENT, IBOARD_WRITER, PROJECT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_IBOARD.NEXTVAL, #{iboardTitle}, #{iboardContent}, #{iboardWriter}, #{projectNo} )

INSERT INTO IATTACHMENT( IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IATTACHMENT.NEXTVAL, SEQ_IBOARD.CURRVAL, #{iAttachmentOrigin}, #{iAttachmentPath}, #{iAttachmentChange}, #{iAttachmentLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT(I.IBOARD_NO)) FROM IBOARD I, PRELATION PR, TAGS TG, RECRUITMENT RE, PROJECT P WHERE PR.RECRUITMENT_NO = RE.RECRUITMENT_NO AND PR.TAGS_NO = TG.TAGS_NO AND TG.TAGS_NAME IN #{item} AND I.IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL AND (I.IBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT DISTINCT I.IBOARD_NO AS "IBOARD_NO", I.IBOARD_TITLE AS "IBOARD_TITLE", P.PROJECT_NO AS "PROJECT_NO", I.IBOARD_VIEWS AS "IBOARD_VIEWS", I.IBOARD_CONTENT AS "IBOARD_CONTENT", M.MEMBER_NAME AS "IBOARD_WRITER", TO_CHAR(I.IBOARD_INSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "IBOARD_INSERT", P.PROJECT_START AS "PROJECT_START", P.PROJECT_END AS "PROJECT_END" FROM IBOARD I, PROJECT P, PRELATION PR, TAGS TG, RECRUITMENT RE, MEMBER M WHERE PR.RECRUITMENT_NO = RE.RECRUITMENT_NO AND I.PROJECT_NO = P.PROJECT_NO AND PR.TAGS_NO = TG.TAGS_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = I.IBOARD_WRITER AND TG.TAGS_NAME IN #{item} AND I.IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL AND (I.IBOARD_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR I.IBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR P.PROJECT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') ORDER BY ${sort} DESC

SELECT IATTACHMENT_NO, IBOARD_NO, IATTACHMENT_ORIGIN, IATTACHMENT_CHANGE, IATTACHMENT_PATH, IATTACHMENT_INSERT, IATTACHMENT_LEVEL FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE IBOARD SET IBOARD_VIEWS = IBOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT RE.RECRUITMENT_NO, T.TAGS_NAME AS "TAGS_NO" FROM RECRUITMENT RE, TAGS T, PRELATION PR WHERE PR.TAGS_NO = T.TAGS_NO AND RE.RECRUITMENT_NO = #{recruitMentNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE IBOARD SET IBOARD_VIEWS = IBOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{ino} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT I.IBOARD_NO, I.IBOARD_TITLE, I.IBOARD_CONTENT, I.IBOARD_INSERT, I.IBOARD_VIEWS, M.MEMBER_NAME AS "IBOARD_WRITER" FROM IBOARD I, MEMBER M WHERE I.IBOARD_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO AND IBOARD_NO = #{ino} AND IBOARD_DELETE IS NULL
SELECT * FROM IATTACHMENT WHERE IBOARD_NO = #{iboardNo} AND IATTACHMENT_LEVEL = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IREPLY(IREPLY_NO, IBOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, IREPLY_CONTENT, IREPLY_INSERT) VALUES(SEQ_IREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{iboardNo}, #{memberNo}, #{ireplyContent}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO REPLY(IREPLY_NO, IBOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, IREPLY_CONTENT, IREPLY_INSERT, IREPLY_PARENT )
